contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 10, 1985 D Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Championship Section)
Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Championship Section) 1 Entertainments Contest Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival milton-keynes-brass-band-festival-championship-sec
Stantonbury Leisure Centre Sports Hall, Milton Keynes Bands played an entertainment programme including "Tangents", Bulla. 13 bands competed. Best Instrumentalist: Cornet, Hanwell
1st Prize: £300.00 (Mk Co-Op trophy) 2nd Prize: £150.00 (Legal & General trophy) 3rd Prize: £80.00 (Yardleys trophy) 4th Prize: £50.00
March 7, 2011, 2:54 p.m. Nov. 28, 2020, 11:14 a.m.

2 Yarwell & Nassington Don Blakeson
3 Lancashire Constabulary Band Richard Evans
4 Trentham Brass Edward Gray
